Articles.Content: There is a sound when on Kerbin that I interpret as a gusty wind on a microphone.  It is always present on land or flying and is really irritating.  It seems to be in the "ambience" section, but I have to set it to "0" to make it go away which also mutes other sounds which I want to keep.  I have searched for a sounds folder but it is empty.  Is there any way to mute just this one sound?
